sentences.en: First , order to maintain good tone, preferably a chewing gum before kissing.
sentences.cn: 为了保持好口气, 最好在接吻前嚼一嚼口香糖.

sentences.en: I might travel by York or preferably by Preston.
sentences.cn: 我想旅途中经过约克,但最好是经过普雷斯顿.

sentences.en: It is for the same reason that atomic weapons are preferably called " nuclear weapons ".
sentences.cn: 由于同样原因,把 原子武器 称作核武器会更合适些.

sentences.en: Minimum 5 years working experience in IT - related field, preferably that in MNC.
sentences.cn: 至少5年以上IT业的工作经历, 有在跨国公司工作的经历更佳.

sentences.en: The best treatment is antibiotics, preferably by injection.
sentences.cn: 最佳的治疗方法是使用抗生素, 能够注射就更好.

sentences.en: The calculated results showed that ZMS adsorbent adsorbs preferably oxygen to nitrogen.
sentences.cn: 实验结果表明,沸石分子筛吸附剂优先吸附氮.

sentences.en: The neural network can preferably solve the non - linear problem.
sentences.cn: 利用神经网络建模可以较好地解决非线性问题.

sentences.en: The particles are preferably prepared by the limited coalescence polymerization technique.
sentences.cn: 这种颗粒,最好由有限聚结聚合技术来制备.

sentences.en: The predetermined solution viscosity of the thickened solution should preferably be above 600 centipoises.
sentences.cn: 增稠溶液的规定粘度最好在600厘泊以上.

sentences.en: The sensitizer is preferably encapulsated in quite small capsules of a solid.
sentences.cn: 最好是将敏化剂包裹在十分小的固体包覆层中.

sentences.en: They should be available, preferably printed and distributed before the meeting.
sentences.cn: 所有资料都要准备好, 最好在会议前印好并分发出去.

sentences.en: They want to buy a new house, near the sea preferably.
sentences.cn: 他们要购买一所新房子, 最好在海边.

sentences.en: To cater for all eventualities, preferably notarized Department requested notarized.
sentences.cn: 为防万一, 最好请公证处公证.

sentences.en: University education , preferably in Finance, Business Administration or related subject.
sentences.cn: 大学毕业, 财务 、 工商管理或其他相关专业.

sentences.en: You may come, preferably, in the morning.

words.tran_cn: 更好的，更可取的；更合意的
